<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/flows/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a [Flow](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/flows/FlowEditor#flows) in an Environment by its id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Flow","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"environment":{"type":"string"},"version":{"type":"string"},"docsMarkdown":{"type":"string"},"assignees":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["id","name","environment"],"title":"Flow"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
